content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new research or production facilities have been successfully placed by the agent. Instead, the agent has interacted with two pre‐existing furnace systems used for ore processing:

### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace used to convert iron ore into iron plates (10 iron ore and 10 coal inserted with 30 iron plates extracted).

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace employed for smelting copper ore into copper plates (50 copper ore and 10 coal inserted with 45 copper plates extracted).

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• When using the entity‐retrieval API (get_entities), ensure the arguments match the expected signature. Avoid supplying unsupported keywords (such as “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Lab placement and crafting failures stem from unavailable lab inventory and missing sub‐ingredients. Before attempting lab placement, verify that the lab item is in inventory. Prior to crafting a lab, confirm that all necessary components (for example, iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, copper-plate, copper-cable, and electronic-circuit) are available or producible via functioning smelting and production chains.

• When iterating over retrieved entities (e.g. filtering labs), guard against the possibility that the retrieval function returns None. Use a fallback (such as an empty list) to prevent TypeErrors from attempting to iterate a NoneType.
